Module swan.g09.cs230a2
Package swan.g09.cs230a2

Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.InputManager
public class InputManager extends Object
The InputManager class allows other classes to create handlers for input events it provides static helper functions for other parts of the program. Automatically triggers event handlers when provided with a JavaFX scene.

  • Method Details

    • setScene

      public static void setScene(javafx.scene.Scene newScene)
      Sets the scene to listen to events from. Stops listening on the previous scene if it exists.
      Parameters:
      newScene - The scene to listen to.

    • clearAllHandlers

      public static void clearAllHandlers()
      De-registers all currently registered event handlers.

    • clearKeydownHandlers

      public static void clearKeydownHandlers()
      De-registers event handlers for key-down events.

    • clearKeyupHandlers

      public static void clearKeyupHandlers()
      De-registers event handlers for key-up events.

    • clearTickHandlers

      public static void clearTickHandlers()
      De-registers event handlers for tick-based events.

    • addKeydownHandler

      public static void addKeydownHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode, Runnable handler)
      Adds a Runnable to the list of key-down handlers for the specified key code.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The key code to listen for.
      handler - The handler to be run when events are received.

    • addKeyupHandler

      public static void addKeyupHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode, Runnable handler)
      Adds a Runnable to the list of key-up handlers for the specified key code.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The key code to listen for.
      handler - The handler to be run when events are received.

    • addTickHandler

      public static void addTickHandler(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode, Runnable handler)
      Adds a Runnable to the list of tick-based handlers for the specified key code.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The key code to listen for.
      handler - The handler to be run when events are received.

    • tick

      public static void tick()
      Method run by Timer to trigger tick-based event handlers.
